"Please contact IT Team (Failed to update DB)"
Are you sure, you want to continue - interview
"Both Month and Year don't be zero!!"
Section 04: LHW MONTHLY REPORT AND SOURCE REGISTER VALIDATION:

Section 07: HOUSEHOLD MEMBERS INFORMATION: All Household members greater than and equal to the age of 10 years, if 15 to 19 married female she would be considered as MWRA, not eligible for Adolescent.
Section W: MARRIED WOMEN OF REPRODUCTIVE AGE INFORMATION: Married Female members aged between (1549). she should be available during the interview, One MWRA per household will be selected
Section AB: ADOLESCENT INFORMATION: Adolescent Unmarried aged between (1019) years will be eligible for this section, only one Adolescent will be selected per household
Section M: VILLAGE HEALTH COMMITTEE (VHC): This section will appear a Single time for any male member of HH greater than the age of 19
The name of head of the household corresponds to the line listing data.
Name of new head of the household
More than Higher Secondary School Pass
Is LHW monthly report are completely filled for previous month?
Is all LHW Source registers are completely filled for previous month?
If the source registers and/or monthly reports are not completely filled in, what are the possible reasons for the missing data?
Radio Presence of other vertical reporting requirements
Is there a deadline for submission of the monthly LHW report by the LHS or district authority?
Which of the following LHW kit items are currently available?
LHW kit medications and contraceptives are currently available?
Section 04: LHW Monthly Report and Source Registers Validation
Number of VHC meetings held this month
Number of WSGs meetings held this month
Number of Educational Gathering in Local nearby schools
Numbers of newborns who have been weighed (within one week of birth)
Numbers of newborns who have been applied CHX gel (within 24hours of birth)
Numbers of women who have been visited for ANC (New + Previous Month)
Number of Pregnant Women received Misoprostol Tablets
Number of Pregnant Women received Iron Folic Acid Tablets
Numbers of women who have been visited for PNC (within 24hours of birth)
Number of new FP method users
Number of Injectable Users Sayana Press
Number of clients referred to FP center or HFs
Number of clients provided condoms by LHW
Number of clients provided COC/POP by LHW
Number of clients provided Injectable contraceptives by LHW
Total Number of Live births in Community
Total Number of Still births in Community
Total number of Deaths (within first week)
Total number of Deaths (after first week to 28 days)
Total number of Deaths (after one month to 1 year)
Total number of Deaths (after one year to 5 year)
Is there a discrepancy between LHW source register and monthly report?
If there was a discrepancy observed between the main source document and the monthly reports, what are the reasons for the discrepancy?
Information from all source documents not compiled correctly

Note: The Application will Ask Data Collector to enter the Details of 10 random households from LHW Registers that are currently active and have our target respondents and will ask to capture the required information
Information will be auto generated from Household Identification
What is the highest class (NAME) completed
Section W: Married Women of Reproductive Age (MWRA)
How many children do you have?
Section W2: LHW HOME VISIT VALIDATION
If last born is more than 5 years then only family planning section and WSG will open for MWRA
Did LHW visit your house in Last Three (03) months?
Since last 03 months how many times did, she (LHW) visit you?
What was the purpose of LHW Visit?
Provide PNC services to your newborn
Provide Child Health Services to your under 5 child (Pneumonia / diarrhea)
What did LHW’s do during your last pregnancy as part of your ANC?
Informed about danger signs during pregnancy
Information about the Safety Precaution related to Corona
Did LHW visit you after delivery?
What did LHW do, as a part of your PNC?
Referred to HCF for routine Check-up
Information about the Safety Precaution related to Corona
What did LHW do for your new-born?
Referred to HCF for routine Checkup
Provide support for mother to early initiation of breastfeeding
Informed mother about newborn danger signs
Information about the Safety Precaution related to Corona
What services did she provide when your child was sick with diarrhea?
Informed mother about home preparation of ORS
Referral to HCF for Diarrhea treatment
Informed about danger signs of diarrhea
What services did she provide when your child was sick with pneumonia?
Used ARI timer to count breaths for the child when he was sick?
Referral to any HCF for Pneumonia treatment
Information about danger signs of pneumonia
Are you satisfied with the services provided by LHW?
Section W3: FAMILY PLANNING KNOWLEDGE & PRACTICE AMONG MWRA
Are you aware of family planning methods ?
Does LHW visit you in last three months for providing FP services?
Did LHW counseled you for family planning, when visiting your home?
Which method/s she counseled for? (Do not prompt, select all that responded)
Are you / your husband currently using any contraceptive?
Which method you / your husband are currently using?
From where you / your husband got the current method to delay or avoid pregnancy?
Are you / your husband satisfied with method you are currently using?
(Current)Method using was not of my choice
Reasons for not using contraceptives. (Do not prompt, select all that responded)
If not using currently, did you ever used a contraceptive method?
If yes, what was the last used method (Mark only one method)?
Section W4: Women Support Group (WSG) Validation
Are you aware of Women Support Group (WSG)?
Have you ever attended any WSG?
Reason for not attending the WSG?
Not know any kind of sessions/services provided in the area
Session/ facility situated far from house
Since last 06 months how many times you have attended the Support Group meeting
What Topics were covered during support group sessions, which you had attended? Do Not Probe
Danger signs of pregnancy, delivery and postpartum
Newborn Danger Signs and Newborn Care
Birth Preparedness, Three Delays, and Importance of Facility Birth
Family Planning (Importance and Methods) and HTSP
Questions related to the topic you will select above, should be open below.
What information do you know about Routine Immunization (TT, ROTA & Pneumococcal Vaccine)?
Child immunization keeps the child safe
LAST ATTENDED session topic you will select above, should be open below. ( enter number from the list W405)
For vaccination contact with local Vaccinator or public health facility
Complete child immunization according to national guideline
ROTA and Pneumococcal vaccine prevent diarrhea and pneumonia in children
Two doses of TT Vaccine during pregnancy are very important for safe delivery
What information do you know about ANC?
About taking tablets of folic acid/iron
What information do you know about PNC?
Initiation of Breastfeeding just after birth
What information do you know about Danger signs of pregnancy, delivery and postpartum?
What information do you know about Newborn Danger Signs and Newborn Care?
Puss or discharge from cord, redness on surroundings
Diarrhea/ vomiting or Unable to feed
Delay bathing till 6 hours after birth
Initiation of BF just after birth
What information do you know about Birth Preparedness, Three Delays and Importance of Facility Birth?
Ensure the availability of SBA or Health Facility
Ensure the availability of Misoprostol Tablet
Preparation of necessary equipment for birth
Utilize nearby available delivery facilities instead of home birth
Deciding to seek appropriate medical help for an obstetric emergency
Delay in reaching an appropriate obstetric facility
Delay in receiving adequate health care at facility
What information do you know about Family Planning (Importance and Methods) and HTSP?
After a live birth minimum interval
Before attempting the next pregnancy is at least 24 months
After abortion minimum interval to next pregnancy should be at least 6 months
What information do you know about Maternal Nutrition and Breast Feeding?
Increase quantity of food which is available
Pregnant women can take all type of food
Initiation of BF just after birth
Baby should feed at least 8-12 time in 24 hours
No need of extra milk or water for EBF baby till 6 months
What information do you know about Gender Based Violance (Violance Against Women)?
What are types of GBV in your community.
What are examples of GBV in your community.
Physical Violence (beating, burning, kicking, punching, biting, maiming, or killing, or the use of objects or weapons)
Verbal Violence (jokes, spreading rumors, threats, slander, incitement of violence or hate)
Psychological or Emotional violence (being violent or abusive is to hurt the integrity and dignity of another person)
Sexual Violence (forced child marriages, rape, forced pregnancy, forced abortion, forcing certain types of sexual activities, use of any body part or object)
What information do you know about Menstrual Hygiene Management?
Why is menstrual hygiene management important
How do you maintain hygiene during your period
What is menstruation? And what is its cycle
What is menstrual hygiene material available in your community and how to use it
What information do you know about Breast Examination and Self Care?
Start by looking for differences between your breasts
Use 3 fingers when examining your breasts clockwise and anticlockwise
Examine the areas surrounding the breast
Perform the physical examination each month
What information do you know about Child Health (General Danger Signs & Pneumonia)?
What is general danger sign in 2months to 5 years child?
Can\'t the baby drink the mother\'s milk or anything or is everything vomiting
Is the child drowsy or unconscious
Does the child have seizures or seizures during the current illness
How to assess and classify pneumonia?
Does the child have a cough or difficulty breathing
Count the speed of breath in one minute
Look for chest indrawing and listen for stridor
What information do you know about Child Health (Major Killers & Diarrhea)?
What are five major child killer diseases?
How to assess and classify diarrhea
Examine your child\'s ability to drink
Examine the child\'s skin with a pinch and examine his / her eyes
How to prepare ORS at home
What do you think now what is your role after attending the session?
What do you think we need to improve in this support group session?
Why do adolescent need reproductive health education
What are five key domains of ARHE
Note: This section will be repeated according to the number of Adolescents available mentioned in Household Information
Are you aware about any community center/ in your village/Mohalla for adolescents?
HINT: (A Community centre/space is a public location where members of a community tend to gather for group activities, social support, public information, and other purposes)
Can you name any? (Select all that responded without probing)
Have you ever visited/attended any community center/?
Are you aware of Adolescent Friendly center (AFC)?
Have you ever attended any session there?
Reasons for not attending the session?
Not know any kind of sessions/services provided in the area
Session/ facility situated far from house
Where this Adolescently friendly session conducted?
What session(s) did you attend? (Do not probe)
Are you satisfied with the services provided at AFC?
Do you know that there are laws against marriages below 18 years of age?
At the onset of puberty, what types of changes start to occur? (select as many as apply without probing)
Have you ever attended a GBV awareness WSG by LHW or aware about this topic?
If yes, what types of GBV you was known about?
Have you experienced any GBV in last three months
Have you ever heard about any of the following:
Use of weapon to force into sexual act
From where you have heard about these?
Note: This section will appear Single time for any male member of HH greater than the age of 19
Is there any male member available in household?
Are you aware of Village Health Committee (VHC)?
Have you ever attended any family planning session and gender-based violence session in VHC? Or any other topic?
When did you attend last VHCs in person?
Reasons for not attending VHC session?
Not allowed in my family/ culture
Not aware off any kind of sessions/services provided in the area
Session/ facility situated far from my house
What do you think now what is your role after attending the session?

Gender-Based Violence -Household Interview: This section will be asked from LHW during LHW Evaluation, Only for District Matiari and Kamber Shahdadkot This Section will be repeated for Selected MWRA, Adolescent, and Male members of the household
This section will be asked from every selected MWRA, Adolescent, and Male member of the household
Do you know any types of GBV?
If yes, what is your source of information
At what age do you feel males & females should marry
Do you know what the legal age for marriage in Sindh is?
As early as possible after getting puberty
How old were you when you got married?
What do you think about the age you got married?
Do you think a person should have a say in choosing who they marry?
Do you think a boy should be punished if he refuses to marry who his parents tell him to?
If yes, how will a boy be punished?
Do you think a girl should be punished if she refuses to marry who her parents tell her to?
If yes, how will a girl be punished?
Do you think it is ok for a man to do the following to a woman in a relationship?
Be angry or jealous if his partner talks to other men
Accuses his partner of being unfaithful
Does not permit his partner to meet her female friends
Limits her contact with her own family
Wants to know where she is all the time
Do you think it is ok for a woman to do the following to a man in a relationship?
Be angry or jealous if her partner talks to other women
Accuses her partner of being unfaithful
Does not permit her partner to meet his male friends
Limits his contact with his own family
Wants to know where he is all the time
Do you think it is ok if the following is done to a man?
Push, shake or throw something at him
Twist his arm or pull his hair
Do you think it is ok if the following is done to a woman?
Push, shake or throw something at her
Twist her arm or pull her hair
Threaten her with a knife or gun
Do you think it is ok if the following is done to a man?
Threatening to hurt/harm someone he cares about
Do you think it is ok if the following is done to a woman?
Threatening to hurt/harm someone she cares about
Do you think it is ok if the following is done to a woman?
In your opinion, is a male justified doing any of the above to a female in the following situations:
If she goes out without telling him
If she refuses to have physical relations with him
If she disobeys anyone in the household
If she ran away from home
If she marries against her family’s will
Who is more likely to inflict violence in your community?
Do you know of any services or places in your community, where someone can get help for GBV
If yes, can you please mention these?
Do you think you have a role to play in GBV mitigation
Spread awareness of GBV in community
Do you think there should be sessions on GBV for those who are your age?
If yes, what are the reasons?
GBV awareness is important for males & females
Males & females should know how to deal with GBV
Males & females should know GBV is wrong
If no, what are the reasons?
They are too young to know
Have you ever attended a session on GBV
If yes, who conducted that session?
If yes, were the following topics covered in the session
Examples of GBV in your community
If yes, what did you learn from it?
Effects of GBV on men and women
Spread awareness of GBV in community
GBV services and support in my area
